# <a name="address-book-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="4827a-102">在 Outlook.com 中的通訊錄</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4827a-102">Address book in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4827a-103">您的 Outlook.com 「 通訊錄稱為 「 人員 」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4827a-103">Your Outlook.com address book is called People.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4827a-104">若要移至您[的人員](https://outlook.live.com/people/)] 頁面上，選取 [**人員**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4827a-104">To go to your [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/) page, select **People**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="4827a-105">右下角] 頁面上，或在頁面的左上角的應用程式選取器。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4827a-105">at the bottom corner of the page, or from the app selector at the top corner of the page.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4827a-106">了解如何[建立、 檢視和編輯在 Outlook.com 中的連絡人](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4827a-106">Learn how to [Create, view, and edit contacts in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
